channel.title: Hanif Al Fathoni
channel.description: Recent content on Hanif Al Fathoni

item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Hanif Al Fathoni. I am a student at the UPN Veteran Jawa Timur. I am currently studying Informatics or Computer Science. I am interested in the field of web development. I am also interested in the field of cloud computing and machine learning. Experience Backend Developer Intern Looyal Indonesia Internship July 2023 - October 2023 Revamped Looyal’s existing Point of Sales API and Whatsapp Chatbot API, refactoring it into TypeScript.

item.title: My Portfolio
item.description: Freelance Projects Villa di Jogja Landing Page and Admin CMS Villa di Jogja is a landing page and admin CMS for villa rental in Yogyakarta. This project is built using the CodeIgniter 4 framework and MySQL database. Tech Stack: CodeIgniter 4 MySQL Bootstrap 5 Purchase Order System Purchase Order System is a web-based application for managing purchase orders. This project is built using the Laravel framework and MySQL database. Tech Stack:
